verses.verse: In thee, O YY <WH3068>, do I put my trust <WH2620> <WH8804>: let me never <WH408> <WH5769> be put to confusion <WH954> <WH8799>.
Deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> me in thy righteousness <WH6666>, and cause me to escape <WH6403> <WH8762>: incline <WH5186> <WH8685> thine ear <WH241> unto me, and save <WH3467> <WH8685> me.

Be thou my strong <WH6697> habitation <WH4583>, whereunto I may continually <WH8548> resort <WH935> <WH8800>: thou hast given Mitzvah <WH6680> <WH8765> to save <WH3467> <WH8687> me; for thou art my rock <WH5553> and my fortress <WH4686>.
Deliver <WH6403> <WH8761> me, O my 'Elohim <WH430>, out of the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563>, out of the hand <WH3709> of the unrighteous <WH5765> <WH8764> and cruel man <WH2556> <WH8802>.
For thou art my hope <WH8615>, O YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>: thou art my trust <WH4009> from my youth <WH5271>.

By thee have I been holden up <WH5564> <WH8738> from the womb <WH990>: thou art he that took <WH1491> <WH8802> me out of my mother's <WH517> bowels <WH4578>: my praise <WH8416> shall be continually <WH8548> of thee.
I am as a wonder <WH4159> unto many <WH7227>; but thou art my strong <WH5797> refuge <WH4268>.
Let my mouth <WH6310> be filled <WH4390> <WH8735> with thy praise <WH8416> and with thy honour <WH8597> all the day <WH3117>.
Cast me not off <WH7993> <WH8686> in the time <WH6256> of old age <WH2209>; forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> me not when my strength <WH3581> faileth <WH3615> <WH8800>.
For mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> speak <WH559> <WH8804> against me; and they that lay wait <WH8104> <WH8802> for my soul <WH5315> take counsel <WH3289> <WH8738> together <WH3162>,
Saying <WH559> <WH8800>, 'Elohim <WH430> hath forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> him: persecute <WH7291> <WH8798> and take <WH8610> <WH8798> him; for there is none to deliver <WH5337> <WH8688> him.
O 'Elohim <WH430>, be not far <WH7368> <WH8799> from me: O my 'Elohim <WH430>, make haste <WH2363> <WH8798> <WH8675> <WH2439> for my help <WH5833>.

Let them be confounded <WH954> <WH8799> and consumed <WH3615> <WH8799> that are adversaries <WH7853> <WH8802> to my soul <WH5315>; let them be covered <WH5844> <WH8799> with reproach <WH2781> and dishonour <WH3639> that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> my hurt <WH7451>.
But I will hope <WH3176> <WH8762> continually <WH8548>, and will yet praise <WH8416> thee more <WH3254> <WH8689> and more <WH3254> <WH8689>.
My mouth <WH6310> shall shew forth <WH5608> <WH8762> thy righteousness <WH6666> and thy salvation <WH8668> all the day <WH3117>; for I know <WH3045> <WH8804> not the numbers <WH5615> thereof.
I will go in <WH935> <WH8799> the strength <WH1369> of the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>: I will make mention <WH2142> <WH8686> of thy righteousness <WH6666>, even of thine only.
O 'Elohim <WH430>, thou hast taught <WH3925> <WH8765> me from my youth <WH5271>: and hitherto have I declared <WH5046> <WH8686> thy wondrous works <WH6381> <WH8737>.

Now also when <WH5704> I am old <WH2209> and grayheaded <WH7872>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> me not; until I have shewed <WH5046> <WH8686> thy strength <WH2220> unto this generation <WH1755>, and thy power <WH1369> to every one that is to come <WH935> <WH8799>.
Thy righteousness <WH6666> also, O 'Elohim <WH430>, is very high <WH4791>, who hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> great things <WH1419>: O 'Elohim <WH430>, who is like unto thee!

Thou, which hast shewed <WH7200> <WH8689> me great <WH7227> and sore <WH7451> troubles <WH6869>, shalt quicken <WH2421> <WH8762> me again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and shalt bring me up <WH5927> <WH8686> again <WH7725> <WH8799> from the depths <WH8415> of the earth <WH776>.
Thou shalt increase <WH7235> <WH8686> my greatness <WH1420>, and comfort <WH5162> <WH8762> me on every side <WH5437> <WH8735>.

I will also praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee with the psaltery <WH3627> <WH8676> <WH5035>, even thy truth <WH571>, O my 'Elohim <WH430>: unto thee will I sing <WH2167> <WH8762> with the harp <WH3658>, O thou Holy One <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
My lips <WH8193> shall greatly rejoice <WH7442> <WH8762> when I sing <WH2167> <WH8762> unto thee; and my soul <WH5315>, which thou hast redeemed <WH6299> <WH8804>.

My tongue <WH3956> also shall talk <WH1897> <WH8799> of thy righteousness <WH6666> all the day <WH3117> long: for they are confounded <WH954> <WH8804>, for they are brought unto shame <WH2659> <WH8804>, that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> my hurt <WH7451>.
